Settlers of Catan AI Agent

Also organizing TreeHacks! (treehacks.com)

coolest_project: As a team, we created a Java Based Basic Network Simulator. Using this GUI based application, the user could create nodes and connect them using links.Then the transfer could be classified as TCP and FTP, and simulate it using Djikstra's algorithm or our own custom-designed algorithm.

name: Yupeng Zhao, or Patrick

college: University of Waterloo, Waterloo, Ontario, Canada

https://github.com/Brijeshrpatel9/PersonalizedHolidayPlanner

I <3 civic applications of software development, and every hackathon has the potential to catalyze projects that need to happen.

Stackit is a CLI for StackOverflow, to integrate problem solving seamlessly into the developer workflow. It placed in the top 5 at SB Hacks, made the front page of ProductHunt, and was downloaded hundreds of times in the first week alone.
https://github.com/lukasschwab/stackit
